item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Introducing Vaulted Backup for Azure Data Lake Storage
item.description:
Microsoft announced the Public Preview of Vaulted Backup for Azure Data Lake Storage (ADLS). Azure Backup now supports vaulted protection for ADLS, providing secure offâ€‘site backups to help ensure business continuity and compliance and to protect data from accidental deletion.

  • Source: Azure Updates
